product_name: Native Eyewear Chonga Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Native Eyewear Chonga polarized sunglasses provide serious coverage in a playful package. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black Lime Burst frames feature polarized gray lenses and are ideal for extremely bright sunlight; gray tint helps maintain color saturation and natural contrasts. Maple Tort frames feature polarized brown lenses that are ideal for bright sunlight; brown tint enhances contrast and detail definition. Polarized Crystal Carbonate(R) (P.C.C.) lenses have the strongest hard coating available to protect against scratching. P.C.C. lenses pass the rigorous ANSI Z80.3 tests for optical clarity and impact resistance and block 100% of harmful UVA and UVB light. Tough thermoplastic frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Venting system incorporated into the frames enhances airflow and virtually eliminates fog and condensation. Self-adjusting nose pads and temple boots create a non-slip grip that keeps sunglasses in place, ensuring a soft feel and personalized fit. Mastoid Temple Grip design ensures the temple ends hug behind your ears to securely keep sunglasses in place. Anti-Ocular Intrusion System(R), a 4-point configuration, helps prevent lenses from shooting into your face in the event of high-velocity impact. Cam-action spring hinges quickly lock temples in position. The Native Chonga polarized sunglasses are sized to best fit medim-large profiles. Includes a soft protective pouch that doubles as a cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Native Eyewear Chonga polarized sunglasses provide serious coverage in a playful package.
